actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain present and former employees of the Defense Supply Agency at the Defense Construction Supply Center in Columbus, Ohio.

summary.text: Considers service performed by various individuals over a specified time period to be creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain present and former employees of the Defense Supply Agency at the Defense Construction Supply Center in Columbus, Ohio.
